quote: The dog ran into the kitchen, stuck his nose in Grandma's crotch, and snuffled.Dang,"" Grandma said. ""Guess my new perfume really works. I'm gonna have to try it out at the seniors meeting.
quote_letters: THE DOG RAN INTO THE KITCHEN STUCK HIS NOSE IN GRANDMAS CROTCH AND SNUFFLEDDANG GRANDMA SAID GUESS MY NEW PERFUME REALLY WORKS IM GONNA HAVE TO TRY IT OUT AT THE SENIORS MEETING
